definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: There's a partial list over by the cash register .
sentences.chinese: 现金出纳机旁边有张部分的进货单。

sentences.english: Dog grain that Shenyang pet shop sells. Where does the pet articles for use toy wait to replenish stock?
sentences.chinese: 沈阳宠物店卖的狗粮。宠物用品玩具等在哪进货？

sentences.english: Directly from the factory purchase price lower than the Beijing and Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 公司直接从厂家进货，价格低于京津两市。

sentences.english: The reception among food distributors and buyers for store chains has been favorable, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，食品批发商以及连锁店进货商对他们看好。

sentences.english: I just need to order popular well-known books from efficient publishers.
sentences.chinese: 只是对于知名畅销书，我得从有渠道的出版商处进货。

sentences.english: There is no incoming inspection record for non-woven fabrics C724.
sentences.chinese: 没有无纺布C724的进货检验记录。

sentences.english: I'm trying to find the cheapest price possible.
sentences.chinese: 希望能找到尽量低的进货价。

sentences.english: They were overstocked on Christmas cards.
sentences.chinese: 他们的圣诞卡进货过多。

sentences.english: Three ways of costing for purchase expenses have been summarized in a commercial enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 针对商品流通企业进货费用的处理归纳了三种方法。

sentences.english: Input date agree with item code back-check whether in price stick up for among stock.
sentences.chinese: 输入日期键入单品号检查是否在价格维护期间进货。

sentences.english: You could not only purchase from us as a stockist but also could order from us after sold .
sentences.chinese: 您可以从我处进货自存也可以卖出后再向我们订货。

sentences.english: But now, we just sell them at the price we buy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，现在我们只能以进货价卖出去。

sentences.english: I need to stock the goods because the price will be cheaper if I do more wholesales.
sentences.chinese: 因为我需要去进货，批发得越多，价格就越便宜。

sentences.english: When it was earlier than six o'clock in the morning, Anyuan got up and rode his tricycle to transport goods.
sentences.chinese: 早上六点不到，安远就起床蹬着三轮去进货了。

sentences.english: The supply department shall be responsible for tracing to the purchasing date and supplier during In-coming inspection.
sentences.chinese: 进货检验中由供应部负责追溯到进货日期与供方。

sentences.english: The supply department shall be responsible for tracing to the purchasing date and supplier during In-coming inspection.
sentences.chinese: 进货检验中由供应部负责追溯到进货日期与供方。

definition: to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to order goods/to place an order
to put together an order of goods
variant of 訂貨|订货[ding4 huo4]
to sell/to sell on commission/to distribute
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
